application.internship_title: Application for Internship - Technology, Data & Innovation
application.role_activities: Work on agile projects, learn programming languages, design and develop innovative products and technical solutions using state-of-the-art software and hardware. Join teams implementing core strategic systems underpinning the bank's businesses. Explore roles in Backend, Frontend, Fullstack, DevOps, QA & Automation, Product Design (UX/UI), and Business Analysis. Gain hands-on experience with real projects, develop digital skills, and work alongside experienced engineers at the forefront of financial services innovation using cutting-edge technologies.
application.requirements_for_the_internship: Studying computer science, mathematics, industrial engineering, or a comparable scientific discipline with a strong IT focus. Interest in innovative technology and financial issues. Some practical experience in programming. Well-developed communication skills and fluency in English. Responsible, committed team player with excellent analytical skills and quick grasp. Creativity and flexibility to thrive in a diverse culture.
